welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shymkent, the vibrant city known for its rich history, diverse culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our charming streets, delicious cuisine, and unique local attractions. Enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories in our beautiful city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shimkent Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Shimkent Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
